name: Tereez_Dza%27lar
content: Tereez was a female Bothan living in 2 BBY. Tereez was employed by Lando Calrissian, while he was Baron Administrator of Cloud City on Bespin, as his wardrobe designer. Later the holostar Javul Charn hired her to be her personal custom designer. While employed by Charn she lived aboard the Nova's Heart.
